subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Colombia struck within four minutes of Didier Drogba’s entry, scoring on James Rodríguez’s header in the 64th minute and on Juan Quintero’s goal six minutes later.
snippet: Colombia struck within four minutes of Didier Drogba’s entry, scoring on James Rodríguez’s header in the 64th minute and on Juan Quintero’s goal six minutes later.
